game.name: Fortune Teller Simulator
game.shortDescription: Step behind the curtain of a moonlit occult salon on a Victorian street. With arcane artifacts and loyal familiars, solve the mysteries in each visitor’s words to deliver Tarot readings that shape their fate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step behind the curtain of a moonlit occult salon on a Victorian street. With arcane artifacts and loyal familiars, solve the mysteries in each visitor’s words to deliver Tarot readings that shape their fate.
